description:
Through this eleven-part series, learn how to effectively and ethically persuade others. Why take this course? Because with persuasion tools, you can:

  • Get a Promotion and Live the Next Part of Your Life
  • Raise Funding for Your Project
  • Lead Others More Effectively
title: Compelling Communication: Reaching Yes
instructors: Anne Grinols, Dr. Greg Leman, Launch Academy
